languages.text: "Это не отменяет положений Лекс Империалис. Кроме того, следование букве закона лишает вас необходимости пятнать руки кровью потенциального святого — либо кардинал пересечет Зев и докажет тем самым свой священный статус, либо сгинет — по воле Императора. Как видите, Лекс Империалис дает ответы на все".

"That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."
languages.original_text: "Это не отменяет положений Лекс Империалис. Кроме того, следование букве закона лишает вас необходимости пятнать руки кровью потенциального святого — либо кардинал пересечет Зев и докажет тем самым свой священный статус, либо сгинет — по воле Императора. Как видите, Лекс Империалис дает ответы на все".

Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if so the Emperor wills. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

languages.text: "Das widerspricht in keiner Weise den Bestimmungen des Lex Imperia. Außerdem müsst Ihr Eure Hände auf diese Weise nicht mit dem Blut eines potenziellen Heiligen besudeln. Entweder der Kardinal passiert den Schlund und beweist so seine Heiligkeit, oder er stirbt, wenn es der Imperator so will. Wie Ihr seht, hat das Lex Imperia auf alles eine Antwort."
languages.original_text: "That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

traits.locale_text: "Das widerspricht in keiner Weise den Bestimmungen des Lex Imperia. Außerdem müsst Ihr Eure Hände auf diese Weise nicht mit dem Blut eines potenziellen Heiligen besudeln. Entweder der Kardinal passiert den Schlund und beweist so seine Heiligkeit, oder er stirbt, wenn es der Imperator so will. Wie Ihr seht, hat das Lex Imperia auf alles eine Antwort."

languages.text: « Ça ne change rien aux préconisations de la Lex Imperialis. De plus, le seul fait de suivre la loi à la lettre vous épargnera la nécessité de vous salir les mains avec le sang d'un saint potentiel. Soit le cardinal ressortira vivant de la Gueule, prouvant ainsi sa sainteté, soit il périra, si telle est la volonté de l'Empereur. Comme vous pouvez le voir, la Lex Imperialis a réponse à tout. »
languages.original_text: "That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne change rien aux préconisations de la Lex Imperialis. De plus, le seul fait de suivre la loi à la lettre vous épargnera la nécessité de vous salir les mains avec le sang d'un saint potentiel. Soit le cardinal ressortira vivant de la Gueule, prouvant ainsi sa sainteté, soit il périra, si telle est la volonté de l'Empereur. Comme vous pouvez le voir, la Lex Imperialis a réponse à tout. »

languages.text: “巨口是否可以通行，这与《帝国法典》的规定无关。此外，只要按照法典的规定行事，你就不必再让自己的双手沾满那位红衣主教的鲜血了。他要么顺利穿过巨口，证明他拥有成为圣人的资格，要么按照帝皇的意志，在巨口中殒命。如你所见，《帝国法典》包含一切问题的答案。”
languages.original_text: "That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

traits.locale_text: “巨口是否可以通行，这与《帝国法典》的规定无关。此外，只要按照法典的规定行事，你就不必再让自己的双手沾满那位红衣主教的鲜血了。他要么顺利穿过巨口，证明他拥有成为圣人的资格，要么按照帝皇的意志，在巨口中殒命。如你所见，《帝国法典》包含一切问题的答案。”

languages.text: «Eso no cambia las estipulaciones de la Lex Imperialis. Además, seguir la ley al pie de la letra l{mf|o|a} exime de la necesidad de mancharse las manos con la sangre de un santo en potencia: o el cardenal atraviesa las Fauces, demostrando así su santidad, o muere en el camino, si el Emperador así lo desea. Como ve, la Lex Imperialis tiene todas las respuestas».
languages.original_text: "That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

traits.locale_text: «Eso no cambia las estipulaciones de la Lex Imperialis. Además, seguir la ley al pie de la letra l{mf|o|a} exime de la necesidad de mancharse las manos con la sangre de un santo en potencia: o el cardenal atraviesa las Fauces, demostrando así su santidad, o muere en el camino, si el Emperador así lo desea. Como ve, la Lex Imperialis tiene todas las respuestas».

languages.text: 「それはレックス・インペリアの規定を何ら損なうものではありません。それに、法律の条文に従うことは、潜在的な聖人の血に手を染める必要を免れることになります。枢機卿は、聖人であることを証明するためにマウを越えるか、皇帝陛下の意志で滅びるかのどちらかを選ぶことになります。ご覧の通り、レックス・インペリアはすべての答えを持っているのです」
languages.original_text: "That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

traits.locale_text: 「それはレックス・インペリアの規定を何ら損なうものではありません。それに、法律の条文に従うことは、潜在的な聖人の血に手を染める必要を免れることになります。枢機卿は、聖人であることを証明するためにマウを越えるか、皇帝陛下の意志で滅びるかのどちらかを選ぶことになります。ご覧の通り、レックス・インペリアはすべての答えを持っているのです」

languages.text: "Bu durum, Lex İmperialis'in hükmünden bir şey eksiltmez. Üstelik kanunlara itaat edişiniz, ellerinizi muhtemel bir azizin kanına bulaştırma yükümlülüğünden de kurtarır sizi. Kardinal ya Ağız'dan geçip azizliğini ispat eder ya da İmparator'un izniyle can verir. Görüldüğü üzere Lex İmperialis'te her şeyin çaresi var."
languages.original_text: "That does nothing to diminish the stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Besides, following the letter of the law absolves you of the necessity of tainting your hands with the blood of a potential saint: either the cardinal will cross the Maw, thus proving his sainthood, or he will perish if the Emperor wills it. As you can see, the Lex Imperialis has all the answers."

traits.locale_text: "Bu durum, Lex İmperialis'in hükmünden bir şey eksiltmez. Üstelik kanunlara itaat edişiniz, ellerinizi muhtemel bir azizin kanına bulaştırma yükümlülüğünden de kurtarır sizi. Kardinal ya Ağız'dan geçip azizliğini ispat eder ya da İmparator'un izniyle can verir. Görüldüğü üzere Lex İmperialis'te her şeyin çaresi var."
